features: Skin Balancing CICA Toner Pads: Help balance irritated skin with our smoothing, gentle toner pads. Formulated to help balance your skin's pH levels and reduce the look of texture and redness. Wave goodbye to tight, irritated skin!

Sensitive Skin's BFF: Our Toner Pads are dermatologist tested, hypoallergenic, non-irritating and perfect for sensitive, combo or oily skin types. These 100% cotton pads contain no allergens, alcohol, gluten, sulfates, parabens, silicones or fragrances

Packed with Benefits: Willow bark extract and Centella asiatica, a traditional Korean beauty ingredient, help reduce redness, soothe irritation and clear pores. This facial toner helps restore your ideal pH balance of 5.5 for a healthier skin barrier

More to Explore From JOAH: Our Korean makeup is created to outperform even the best prestige cosmetic and skin products. Try our full cosmetics and skin care range from eyeliners, lipsticks, foundations through to our skin treatments with premium ingredients
We create our beauty with everything you like in mind. Our effortless Korean Beauty products are cruelty-free, crafted with only good-for-you ingredients and high-quality without the high price tag
body.description: Regain balance for irritated skin with our smoothing toner Formulated with Centella asiatica and willow bark extract, this gentle toner removes impurities as it helps reduce the look of pores and redness. For best results, use after the Heal Me CICA Gentle Foam Cleanser. Centella asiatica (aka CICA): This power plant is a traditional skincare ingredient used for centuries in Asia to restore the skin's barrier and calm the appearance of redness. CICA is a BFF for sensitive skin. Willow bark extract works to smooth skin texture, helps to clear pores and soothe the appearance of irritation. These dermatologist tested, hypoallergenic pH Balancing and non-irritating 100% cotton pads are formulated without allergen components, harmful alcohols, gluten, sulfates, parabens, silicones and synthetic fragrances. We create our beauty with everything you like in mind. Our effortless products are cruelty free, crafted with only good-for-you ingredients and high-quality without the high price tag.We are a Korean-American brand obsessed with bringing you easy-to-use products made with only good-for-you ingredients, so you can conquer any look. JOAH - I Like It Like That.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Gentle Foam Cleanser Toner Pads Spot Patch Cooling Gel Mist Blurring & Cooling Primer Skin Concern Redness, irritation, dirt/oil Redness, irritation, uneven skin texture, dullness Blemishes Overheated skin, redness, dryness, irritation Redness, uneven skin texture/tone Main Benefit Gentle, yet powerful cleansing. Restores the skin barrier & calms irritation. Gently exfoliates to smooth your complexion & lift impurities. Restores pH balance for healthy-looking skin. Absorbs impurities while calming the look of redness and swelling. Clinically proven to cool skin. Hydrates and calms redness to prep for makeup or refresh throughout the day. Corrects redness & blurs skin texture for balanced looking skin, while providing a soothing cooling sensation. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars SO GENTLE SUCH BIG RESULTS
reviews.reviewText: I DONT QUITE KNOW HOW TO EXPLAIN IT BUT THESE MAKE MY SKIN LOOK SO DEWY AND YOUTHFUL.SO SENSITIVE THEY BARELY FEEL LIKE YOURE WIPING ANY SUBSTANCE ON YOUR FACE.GLOWY SKIN RESULTS

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Convenient, but expensive considering pad size
reviews.reviewText: I've tried several toners over the past couple years, and this JOAH toner pad product is very similar to two other products I've tried this year: Celimax blemish toner pads and Pyunkang Yul calming toner pads. All three of these are very similar because these provide toner in the form of pads rather than liquid in a bottle that needs to be dispensed via separately purchased pads. I like all of these products because of the convenience these provide, and while these tout different benefits, the results are largely the same for me. While JOAH is the least expensive of these three at a current price of $12.99 compared to $16.99 for Pyunkang Yul and $20 for Celimax, when taking the number of pads into account these prices result in $0.26, $0.24, and $0.33, respectively. While JOAH and Pyunkang Yul cost about the same per pad, since each Pyunkang Yul pad is significantly larger it's also the best buy. All of this said, my favorite toner continues to be Natural Outcome Man Skin, the best of the ones I've tried. I've been giving myself a clean shave less often the last couple years, and I continue to use Natural Outcome after clean shaves, since I'm already spending a lot of time shaving, but the rest of the week when I shave myself with a stubble guard I use toner pads instead, because I'm trying to save time from the daily routine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works like a magic
reviews.reviewText: I am in love with this toner pad. It does the work really well. I use it every other day but the results are impressive!!! Will purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product has really helped my skin. Had a lot of redness and breakouts and since using the pads and the primer, it has greatly reduced the redness and my skins looks so much better! I will continue using this product and will order again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This is a very easy to use product but my skin is very sensitive and it kind of made it hot. So it’s not that good for sensitive skin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very cooling and refreshing!
reviews.reviewText: This is the skincare brand of Kiss products -- yes those press-on nails. First time trying this brand and I like it!I've used toner pads before but this is smaller than what I'm used to. Instantly cooling and refreshing on the skin! If you're a fan of micellar water or astringent as toner, you'll love these! They're very gentle, made of 100% cotton, soaked in essence, and don't leave fluff on the skin.This is formulated for sensitive skin but will benefit all skin types. It doesn't come with a plastic tong like others, but not really an issue for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2022
reviews.reviewText: These toner pads are amazing. I have started including them in my daily face regimen and I'm so happy with the product. My faces feels so refreshed and bright after use and along with my hydrating spray, vitamin c oil and retinol face cream, I've become obsessed. Very well saturated and two-sided pads where one is exfoliating, and one is smoother. I don't know if it's meant to be used two ways, but I do when I'm looking for a smoother application.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I was afraid they may be similar to Noxema toning pads but they are the opposite with the same effect. There is no burning sensation to your skin but it still removes left over dirt and cleanses skin. There is no real smell to it. I use them day and night!
